Blink Bling

Monday to Friday (5 days) | 2.5 hours each day | Plaza Damansara

2 camp dates

Details

For girls only
Dates & Times August 1st - August 5th - 2:30pm to 5:00pm
August 15th - August 18thth - 2:30pm to 5:00pm
Duration 5-day camp, 2.5 hours each day
Ages 8 - 14
Skill Level Beginners
Location Plaza Damansara
Price RM 899 (Early birds get 15% discount)

What is this camp about?

In this all girl-only camp, learn to make wearable eletronics. You will start with the basic of sewing, to making embroidery with eletronics and sensors.

Take home your soft curcuits project and show case to your friends and family.



Requirements

  • For girls only
  • No experience in sewing or electronics required
